name: Centipulp (Playdate Pulp)
description:
Centipulp is an arcade game very inspired from Centipede an 80's arcade game.
I have started this around the 20th december 2022

V1.0.0 usealy crash after around 1Min of play...it will be correct by time

This game was made with pulp.
https://play.date/dev/#cardPulp

Beat yourself by highscoring !

===============================================================

This is a beta version.

It hasn't been test with a playdate device.

It will be corrected and also extended.

I'll receive my playdate in early 2023 ! i'll be able to test soon :D

It run well on the playdate simulator but can have crash during the party (50% crash on simulator after one minute of playing, it's rare you can go far as you want)

#2 video for music title process with pulp music editor https://samplay.itch.io/pulp-editor-live-session-not-a-game
